an4.83:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an4.83:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṁ upadaṁseti, ananuvicca apariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṁ upadaṁseti—
an4.83:1.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye.
an4.83:2.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge.
an4.83:2.5: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā appasādanīye ṭhāne appasādaṁ upadaṁseti
an4.83:2.6: anuvicca pariyogāhetvā pasādanīye ṭhāne pasādaṁ upadaṁseti—
an4.83:2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge”ti.
